phrs.translation: 谱斑, 海滨, 海滩, 海滨胜地
贝尔马尔酒店, 度假村, 贝尔玛尔酒店, 贝尔马尔
射电谱斑, 电波谱斑

sentences.sentence: PLAGE is a comprehensive system running in 32 bit microcomputer, aimed to perform planar and 3D solid modelling, generate 2D and 3D part drawings and assembly drawings.
sentences.translation: PLAGE是32位微型计算机上运行的，用以进行平面构形及三维实体造型，生成产品的两维及三维零件图和装配图的系统。

sentences.sentence: After one wild attempt we made to meet at night in her garden (of which more later), the only privacy we were allowed was to be out of earshot but not out of sight on the populous part of the plage.
sentences.translation: 在一次疯狂的尝试夜晚在她家后院密会（这是后来的事了）失败后，我们仅有的隐私就剩下限定在人群众多的海滨谈话，可以不被偷听，但是会被监视。
